text: The 2005 200 km of Buenos Aires is the second edition of this race on the TC2000 season. The race was held in the Autódromo Juan y Óscar Gálvez in Buenos Aires. == Results == {| style="background:#f7f8ff;" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 95%; border: gray solid 1px;
